sentences.english: There is little of Satie's sardonic wit to be heard in Skempton's works.
sentences.chinese: 在斯开普顿的作品里几乎听不到萨蒂那种讥讽的智慧。

sentences.english: All morning I have noticed Sunday stealing glances at the plane.
sentences.chinese: 整个早上，我都注意到萨蒂在偷偷地瞟着飞机。

sentences.english: Soon enough the Sardinians will sue for peace and you will have secured the safety of south France.
sentences.chinese: 很快的萨蒂尼亚将求和，您将已获得法国南部的安全。

sentences.english: Mr. Ezzati said China has the resources to make changes.
sentences.chinese: 艾萨蒂说，中国有能力改变现状。

sentences.english: There, in the very end, I saw Sadie sitting in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，我见到了蹲在角落里的萨蒂。

definition: Alexander Scriabin (1872-1915), Russian composer and pianist
Hector Berlioz (1803-1869), French romantic composer, author of Symphonie Fantastique
Gounod (name)/Charles Gounod (1818-1893), French musician and opera composer
Strauss (name)/Johann Strauss (1825-1899), Austrian composer/Richard Strauss (1864-1949), German composer
Piotr Ilyich Tchaikowsky (1840-1893), Russian composer, composer of 6 symphonies and the opera Eugene Onegin
